definitions.definition: expressed in writing rather than in speech

examples.text: Having a written record of what I've done is very valuable.
The council is inviting written submissions from the public before June 19.

definitions.definition: involving writing rather than speaking or practical skills

examples.text: Students must submit one or more pieces of **written work** for assessment.

definitions.definition: in the form of a letter, document, etc. and therefore official

examples.text: No portion of this site may be copied without express **written consent**.
You must give **written permission** before this information can be shared.
In a written statement, the government has denied the claims.

definitions.definition: language expressed in writing rather than in speech

examples.text: the permanence of the written word
